name: Plsvariableselection
tagline: simulation for variable selection using PLS
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This page contains my progress on my R code for my PhD project. Current code is made to run simulations of PLS variable selection algorithms with mixed data types. 

### Authors and Contributors
The content of the codes is based on some of the existing R packages. The modifications are made so that different algorithms can be linked together to handle both categorical and numerical codes. Below is a list of Authors who created some of the original functions:
1. Dr. Benoit Liquet
2. Dr. Beaton Derek
3. Dr. Russolillo, Giorgio
4. Dr. Le Cao

A special thanks is given to Dr. Yoni Nazarathy for his contribution on the correction of mathematical theory of the code. 


### Support or Contact
Please contact yifan.jiang422@gmail.com for suggestions and problems.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
